content: practice your double_crochet stitches with these super easy wrist warmers / fingerless gloves the pattern utlizes double crochets with filet crochet accents at the top and bottom it includes six different sizes from a children s small to adult large the pattern features a photo and video tutorial it s available for free on my blog https //www youshouldcraft com/easy-fingerless-gloves-crochet-pattern/ **materials ** 37 - 87 yards of brava worsted or your favorite worsted weight yarn - i used tidepool j 6 0 mm crochet hook scissors tapestry needle tape measure this pattern is part of a 30-day series for new crocheters learn more here https //www youshouldcraft com/how-to-crochet-30-day-newbie-series/ **share your fingerless gloves ** if you make a pair of fingerless gloves please share them with me on instagram use hashtags #yscnewbie and #youshouldcraft to be featured on the you should craft feed or stories **disclaimer ** you are welcome to sell items made using these patterns using your own images not mine but please provide credit and a link back to youshouldcraft com or my ravelry designer page permission is not granted for mass production or factory manufacturing
